Source: How can I help you today? If you need ideas: - Answering questions: "Can you explain..." - Insert assets: "Create a..." - Add code: "Write a script to..." - Explain code: "Explain the selected code." I'm still learning, so I may not be able to help with everything. You can always ask, though.
en-us: How can I help you today? If you need ideas: - Answering questions: "Can you explain..." - Insert assets: "Create a..." - Add code: "Write a script to..." - Explain code: "Explain the selected code." I'm still learning, so I may not be able to help with everything. You can always ask, though.

Source: I’ll try to do better next time. Help me to improve by answering some quick questions.
en-us: I’ll try to do better next time. Help me to improve by answering some quick questions.

Source:
Hi, %1, I'm your Assistant. I'm here to help you create on Roblox. Before we can get started, I'll need you to review and accept the Terms of Service and Privacy Policy. I learn from the instructions you give me, and will filter out personal information, but to be safe, don't share it with me.
Yes, I accept No, I don't accept

Source: We are updating our data use policy to build better tools for our creators
en-us: We are updating our data use policy to build better tools for our creators

Source:
We are updating our data use policy. Please review the Supplemental Terms. We are making these updates to address the way we process data for the purpose of AI training to develop better tools that support your creation process.

Here is what you need to know:
  • You can control what you share: When you save or publish a new creation, you will see a new toggle that allows you to control what you share to improve generative AI. The toggle is set by default to allow data sharing. You can change this from Creator Hub.
  • No retroactive data sharing: Any experience, avatar or avatar items that you created prior to 07/10/2024 will be set to not sharing by default.
  • Policy update takes effect in 60 days: We will not start collecting or training with the data you share until 09/10/2024
  • Accepting these Supplemental Terms will not affect your ability to change your sharing preferences.
en-us:

  • Policy update takes effect in 60 days: We will not start collecting or training with the data you share until 09/10/2024
  • Accepting these Supplemental Terms will not affect your ability to change your sharing preferences.

Context: Supplemental terms for AI Based tools pulled from https://en.help.roblox.com/hc/en-us/articles/20121392440212-AI-Based-Tools-Supplemental-Terms-and-Disclaimer. This is paragraph 1
Source: Roblox provides certain generative AI-based tools (collectively, "Tools") as an option to facilitate your creation of content and experiences including, for example, by providing suggestions or answering questions, generating and explaining code, executing, and automating actions in Studio, and expediting generation of meshes, textures, materials, and avatars. The Tools include the features accessible through Roblox Assistant. BY PROCEEDING OR USING ANY SUCH TOOLS, YOU ACKNOWLEDGE, ACCEPT AND AGREE TO THE BELOW. IF YOU DO NOT AGREE, YOU MAY NOT USE STUDIO.
en-us: Roblox provides certain generative AI-based tools (collectively, "Tools") as an option to facilitate your creation of content and experiences including, for example, by providing suggestions or answering questions, generating and explaining code, executing, and automating actions in Studio, and expediting generation of meshes, textures, materials, and avatars. The Tools include the features accessible through Roblox Assistant. BY PROCEEDING OR USING ANY SUCH TOOLS, YOU ACKNOWLEDGE, ACCEPT AND AGREE TO THE BELOW. IF YOU DO NOT AGREE, YOU MAY NOT USE STUDIO.

Context: Supplemental terms for AI Based tools pulled from https://en.help.roblox.com/hc/en-us/articles/20121392440212-AI-Based-Tools-Supplemental-Terms-and-Disclaimer. This is paragraph 2.
Source: The Tools are all part of the "Services" as defined in the Roblox Terms of Use (the "Terms"). Capitalized terms not separately defined in these AI-Based Tools Supplemental Terms and Disclaimer (these "Supplemental Terms") have the meanings ascribed to them in the Terms. Your use of the Tools is voluntary and is subject to the Terms, including the Creator Terms, the Privacy and Cookie Policy, and the Roblox Community Standards, in addition to these Supplemental Terms. You remain responsible for ensuring that all content, including code, images, textures and any other UGC that you make available on the Services, including UGC suggested by any of the Tools, complies with the Terms and these Supplemental Terms. Among other things, you must (i) use the Tools in a lawful manner and in compliance with all applicable laws, (ii) use the Tools in a manner that does not infringe or attempt to infringe, misappropriate or otherwise violate any rights of Roblox or any other person or entity; (iii) not reverse engineer, disassemble, decompile, or otherwise attempt to derive or gain access to the Tools; (iv) not obtain or share sensitive personal information of others; (v) not generate unsafe, uncivil, or any other prohibited UGC; and (vi) not input any data or content for which you do not have all necessary rights to use in the Tools. You also should not input any personally identifiable information in the Tools.
en-us: The Tools are all part of the "Services" as defined in the Roblox Terms of Use (the "Terms"). Capitalized terms not separately defined in these AI-Based Tools Supplemental Terms and Disclaimer (these "Supplemental Terms") have the meanings ascribed to them in the Terms. Your use of the Tools is voluntary and is subject to the Terms, including the Creator Terms, the Privacy and Cookie Policy, and the Roblox Community Standards, in addition to these Supplemental Terms. You remain responsible for ensuring that all content, including code, images, textures and any other UGC that you make available on the Services, including UGC suggested by any of the Tools, complies with the Terms and these Supplemental Terms. Among other things, you must (i) use the Tools in a lawful manner and in compliance with all applicable laws, (ii) use the Tools in a manner that does not infringe or attempt to infringe, misappropriate or otherwise violate any rights of Roblox or any other person or entity; (iii) not reverse engineer, disassemble, decompile, or otherwise attempt to derive or gain access to the Tools; (iv) not obtain or share sensitive personal information of others; (v) not generate unsafe, uncivil, or any other prohibited UGC; and (vi) not input any data or content for which you do not have all necessary rights to use in the Tools. You also should not input any personally identifiable information in the Tools.

Context: Supplemental terms for AI Based tools pulled from https://en.help.roblox.com/hc/en-us/articles/20121392440212-AI-Based-Tools-Supplemental-Terms-and-Disclaimer. This is paragraph 3
Source: In addition, you must not, and you agree that you will not, use any of the Tools in any way, directly or indirectly: (i) that violates others' rights or any applicable national, federal, state, local, or international law or regulation; (ii) for the purpose of exploiting, harming, or attempting to exploit or harm to minors in any way; (iii) to generate or disseminate verifiably false information and/or content with the purpose of harming others; (iv) to generate or disseminate personal identifiable information that can be used to harm an individual; (v) to deceive, mislead, defame, disparage, or otherwise harass others; (vi) for fully automated decision making that adversely impacts an individual's legal rights or otherwise creates or modifies a binding, enforceable obligation; (vii) for any use intended to or which has the effect of discriminating against or harming individuals or groups based on online or offline social behavior or known or predicted personal or personality characteristics; (viii) to exploit any of the vulnerabilities of a specific group of persons based on their age, social, physical, or mental characteristics, in order to materially distort the behavior of a person pertaining to that group in a manner that causes or is likely to cause that person or another person physical or psychological harm; (ix) to provide medical advice and medical results interpretation; (x) to generate or disseminate information for the purpose to be used for administration of justice, law enforcement, immigration, or asylum processes, such as predicting an individual will commit fraud/crime commitment (e.g. by text profiling, drawing causal relationships between assertions made in documents, indiscriminate and arbitrarily-targeted use); (xi) to engage in, facilitate, or assist in the planning or development of criminal activities or activities that present a risk of death or bodily harm to individuals; (xii) to create, generate, or facilitate the creation of malicious code, malware, computer viruses or do anything else that could disable, overburden, interfere with or impair the proper working, integrity, operation or appearance of a website or computer system; and (xiii) to create, train, or improve any other similar or competing product.
en-us: In addition, you must not, and you agree that you will not, use any of the Tools in any way, directly or indirectly: (i) that violates others' rights or any applicable national, federal, state, local, or international law or regulation; (ii) for the purpose of exploiting, harming, or attempting to exploit or harm to minors in any way; (iii) to generate or disseminate verifiably false information and/or content with the purpose of harming others; (iv) to generate or disseminate personal identifiable information that can be used to harm an individual; (v) to deceive, mislead, defame, disparage, or otherwise harass others; (vi) for fully automated decision making that adversely impacts an individual's legal rights or otherwise creates or modifies a binding, enforceable obligation; (vii) for any use intended to or which has the effect of discriminating against or harming individuals or groups based on online or offline social behavior or known or predicted personal or personality characteristics; (viii) to exploit any of the vulnerabilities of a specific group of persons based on their age, social, physical, or mental characteristics, in order to materially distort the behavior of a person pertaining to that group in a manner that causes or is likely to cause that person or another person physical or psychological harm; (ix) to provide medical advice and medical results interpretation; (x) to generate or disseminate information for the purpose to be used for administration of justice, law enforcement, immigration, or asylum processes, such as predicting an individual will commit fraud/crime commitment (e.g. by text profiling, drawing causal relationships between assertions made in documents, indiscriminate and arbitrarily-targeted use); (xi) to engage in, facilitate, or assist in the planning or development of criminal activities or activities that present a risk of death or bodily harm to individuals; (xii) to create, generate, or facilitate the creation of malicious code, malware, computer viruses or do anything else that could disable, overburden, interfere with or impair the proper working, integrity, operation or appearance of a website or computer system; and (xiii) to create, train, or improve any other similar or competing product.

Context: Supplemental terms for AI Based tools pulled from https://en.help.roblox.com/hc/en-us/articles/20121392440212-AI-Based-Tools-Supplemental-Terms-and-Disclaimer. This is paragraph 4.
Source: Services, including the Tools, may include or make available Third-Party Services. As set forth in the Terms, Roblox neither controls nor takes responsibility for any Third-Party Services, including without limitation, how a third party may collect, use, or store your information. However, Roblox will not permit Third Party Services that are included in or made available through the Tools, to use your information to train their models. You understand that your use of the Services, including the Tools and, by extension, Third-Party Services, may subject you to fees, terms, and/or policies, such as a privacy policy, that are not controlled by Roblox, including, without limitation, the terms at: https://ai.meta.com/llama3/license/. By your use of the Services, including the Tools and any integrated Third-Party Services, you agree to pay any fees and to follow any terms, conditions, and policies presented by those Third-Party Services.

However, Roblox will not permit Third Party Services that are included in or made available through the Tools, to use your information to train their models. You understand that your use of the Services, including the Tools and, by extension, Third-Party Services, may subject you to fees, terms, and/or policies, such as a privacy policy, that are not controlled by Roblox, including, without limitation, the terms at: https://ai.meta.com/llama3/license/. By your use of the Services, including the Tools and any integrated Third-Party Services, you agree to pay any fees and to follow any terms, conditions, and policies presented by those Third-Party Services.

Context: Supplemental terms for AI Based tools pulled from https://en.help.roblox.com/hc/en-us/articles/20121392440212-AI-Based-Tools-Supplemental-Terms-and-Disclaimer. This is paragraph 5
Source: Roblox may use text and other prompts that you input on the Services as well as your interaction data within the Services, including your activities within Studio and your inputs in and outputs from the Tools in connection with the Services, and you grant Roblox a nonexclusive, royalty-free, perpetual, irrevocable, and fully sublicensable right and license to use such data for any business purpose in connection with operating, providing, or improving the Services, including without limitation in connection with the training of machine learning and related models. For clarity, the foregoing will not affect your ability to control your sharing preferences of your experience and avatar asset data for training purposes.
